title: Does anybody else's League clients just absolutely shit themself after a new Patch? Help PLS!!!!!!!!
body:
My client is having immense issues at the moment and it is incredibly frustrating. It's running like literal shit at the moment. 
From the beginning, as soon as I open up the client and the big "League of Legends" icon appears in the middle of your screen, it sits for a bit, takes sometime to load up, and then the background in a rectangle around the logo turns black and then turns grey, when you click on it, it comes up with this "PVP.net Patcher Kernel is not responding" and then gives you the option to either "Close the program" or "Wait for the program to respond". I choose to close the program, only for the client to finally open up 5 seconds later after I apparently made the decision to close it...

Then, the 'launch' and login screen are kinda fine, little slower than usual, but fine I guess. I tried to go into a Ranked queue and every 30 seconds or so, my league would disconnect, the client would grey out and I'd get this "Connection Timeout: The request to the PVP.net server timed out", and then, I'd close the message, and the queue would kinda just go back to searching 5 seconds later, only for the client to disconnect and the same message to pop up again 30 seconds later. I managed to get into a queue the first time I tried and I just completely disconnected from Champ select. 

So I tried going into a custom game. No queue needed so all I needed was to make a game, the first time I tried, I couldn't get past the "Create Game" screen it would get stuck on "Retrieving Data from Server" and I'd just eventually have to close the client manually. The second time, I managed to get into Champ select at which point I tried to change a summoner spell and it just got stuck on the "Retrieving Date from Server" message and then onto the "Connection Timeout: The request to the PVP.net server timed out" message. I tried a third time, and this time the same thing happened but not until I tried to lock in a champion. 

My internet works fine otherwise, everything else in fact is fine.

replies.body: last time this happened to me I got hold of a riot sup and they sed one of my files were corrupt you mite need to uninstall and then install to fix it that's what I had to do
Yeah I sent in a support ticket, just putting this on here to see if anyone else has a quicker fix to the situation.
kk I hope you don't need to reinstall 3 hours of waiting later ow I can play and the sever is down lol
